mconference.name: Oasis Spa Point
mconference.details: Have a real feel of the establishment way before making your appointment with us. You deserve to be pampered without the hassle and bassle. Book with confidence in an instant!

item.name: Stone Therapy
item.desc:
Heated,smooth stones are placed on certain points on the body to warm and loosen tight muscles and balance energy centers.
KSH:2,500 P.P

item.name: Thigh Therapy
item.desc:
Detoxifying clays pulls toxins from deep within the skin as pure cane sugar sloughs expired cells to reveal.
KSH:3,500 P.P

item.name: G-8 Massage Therapy
item.desc:
Discover the new technological advantages of the G8 Massage Therapy System! Exclusive electro-massage features include exclusive gyrating applicator heads for multiple beauty treatments and services.
KSH:1,500 P.P

item.name: Asian Crushed Pearl Signature Facial
item.desc:
Borrowed from the beauty rituals of the famed geishas, these exotic ingredients are revered for their ability to brighten the complexion, boost circulation, restore suppleness and improve overall skin condition. The end results is a luxurious facial that harkens back to the days of the famed Geishas while helping your ward of environmental damage and slow the aging process by neutralizing dangerous free radicals.
KSH:2,500 P.P

item.name: The Oasis Cathiodermie Experience
item.desc:
A deep cleansing Facial treatment using state-of-the-art skin cleansing equipment to not only remove the service dead skin cells, dirt and debris but also deep cleanses and detoxifies the inner layers of the skin using high frequency and galvanic massage.
KSH:4,500 P.P

item.name: The Oasis Fresh Face
item.desc:
An excellent facial customized for all different skin types to rejuvenate and restore skin radiance. This treatment is designed especially for relaxing and restoring.
KSH:1,500 P.P

item.name: Amazonian Guavaberry Pedicure
item.desc:
Travel to one of the most exotic locales on earth, shrouded in mystery and overflowing with native wildlife. Our Amazonian Guavaberry pedicure harnesses the power of potent antioxidants and essential vitamins-the building blocks of radiant skin with array of responsibly-harvested, sustainable ingredients direct from South America.
KSH:1,200 P.P

item.name: Bamboo-Orchid indulgence pedicure
item.desc:
Unearth ancient beauty treatment from the orient that date back to the Ming dynasty. Steeped in mystery and passed down through the generations, these exotic ingredients are revered for their ability to brighten the complexion, boost circulation, restore suppleness and improve overall skin condition.
KSH:1,500 P.P

item.name: Chocolate covered strawberry Mani/Pedi
item.desc:
Delicious strawberries are blended in insanely decadent chocolate collective to create a treatment with a nod to all things romantic. Enriched with real strawberry, pure shea butter and organic cocoa, you will enjoy this one-of-a-kind treat.
KSH:1,500 P.P
